title: TOMORROW, 28 JAN! CODATA India National Committee and OT-ViRARe Task Group Event: FAIR and Reproducible Structural Biology
content: The upcoming workshop on “ FAIR and Reproducible Structural Biology: Methods, Workflows, and Assessment, ‚Äù brings together scientists, data experts, and policy communities to link AI for Science, FAIR data, reproducibility, and responsible research assessment. Convened under CODATA’s new Open Tools and Visitation Frameworks for Global Research Assessment Reform (OT-ViRARe) Task Group, this workshop is a thematic pre-event to the India AI Impact Summit , aiming to address How AI-drive...
creator: Asha
sourceTitle: CODATA, Committee on Data of the ISC
